comments.message: Just show this coupon?? And start customize my drink?

I was at the anchorpoint starbuck branch and the staff told us that there is no such promotion!! Spoke and show the promtion to the so called "manager" at the counter and she kept insisting that it is not valid at the branch or not from the official website. I even show her the website from starbuck yet she give us the doubtful look and say it is not the official website! Nevermind, I called the customer service (basically she dont even bother to check with their headquarters) to clarify the promotion till then another staff name Jackson spoke to the cs and accept the promotion offer. We are really disappointed with the overall service. 
In future, for such offer please keep all the branch  updated.

Enjoyed this offer at Starbucks @ One North's outlet. Cashier on duty also reminded me that I had to puchase either a Grande or Venti size instead of the Tall size I'd initially asked for.
Said cashier was also very clear on my order, and repeated both my customised drinks to me.
Disclaimer (for other customers who love to customise their drinks): The customisation I did for BOTH my drinks was just a change to Soy Milk and extra shot of Espresso for BOTH drinks.
Kudos to One-North's team! :)

Dear Starbucks, 

After ordering, the staff keyed in, she then tell me its for first 20. How am I suppose to know its only for first 20 when it was not stated at all! I felt cheated. Your staff goes on to tell me that I have a free birthday cake, so on and so forth. I don't feel happy at all after experiencing this early morning. 

FYI, I was there before 8.30am! How early do you expect us to reach your store to be the 1st 20? 7.59am is it?! Super ridiculous! I expect a good explanation from you. 

I am your Gold Member aka January Birthday Girl

Dear Starbuck, I saw the promotion online and happily went to your Orchard Gateway branch to enjoy the promo earlier this morning. I ordered a Grande frapuccino drink. Upon collection, your staff served me with the wrong drink and didn’t give me the Russet Egg Mayo Sandwich. So I asked politely, and your lady staff just told me that as I didn’t inform them in advance, she had already keyed in the transaction. As such, I am not allowed to enjoy the promo. I am truly disappointed. Firstly, I believe there’s always ways to void and revert the transaction. Secondly, I thought is part of their job responsibilities to introduce any ongoing promo to customers. Instead, blaming customer not highlighting the offer to them. Poor customer service and totally ruined my day.
Went @ 9am in Novena Sq. was told they had fully given out the sandwiches. Limited to first 20 only. Not sure how many the other outlets stock, but I believe it is very small amount too.
Went to Starbucks Changi Airport and was told this was only valid for the first 20 customers. And this item was sitting nicely in the display.
Can we take away or do we have to dine in to enjoy this promo?
